column4: hey guys, i have an intel sound card on my sony vaio (snd_hda_intel) sound worked out of the box with gusty, but when i plug my headphones the sound continues to come out from the speakers and nothing from the headphones. so i read somewhere that this is solved by compiling alsa 1.0.15 so i compiler 1.0.16 and still problem not solved
You can see if they have an answer in the #alsa room
